title: 材质包问题
author: ChallengerX
txt_content:
Sphax五边形有木有1024x的？
有没有64x原版高清？

replies.author: pogox
replies.txt_content:
1，否，sphax官方版的最高分辨率为512x
2，原版高清没有明确的定义。。看看这几个怎么样
http://www.planetminecraft.com/t ... stic-default-style/
http://www.planetminecraft.com/t ... le-hd-texture-pack/
http://www.planetminecraft.com/t ... -pro-upgrade-64x64/
